name: Definitions
text:
PART V.  PUBLIC HOUSING; EVICTIONS
 
         As used in this part unless the context otherwise requires:
     "Party" means each person or agency named or admitted as a party or properly seeking and entitled as of right to be admitted as a party in any court or agency proceeding.
     "Public housing project" or "complex" means a housing project directly controlled, owned, developed, or managed by the authority pursuant to part II.
     "Tenant" means any person occupying a room, dwelling unit, living quarters, or space in any public housing project, under or by virtue of any tenancy, lease, license, or permit under or from the authority. [L 2006, c 180, pt of §2]
